sub_workout_group.name: Tactical Combat & Survival Training
sub_workout_group.description: Master combat, stealth, and extreme survival tactics for real-world superhero missions.

sub_workouts.name: Full Contact Hand-to-Hand Combat
sub_workouts.description: Engage in full-contact sparring with multiple attackers.

sub_workouts.name: Weapon Disarmament Training
sub_workouts.description: Disarm live opponents wielding blunt, bladed, or simulated firearms.

sub_workouts.name: Stealth Infiltration Course
sub_workouts.description: Navigate a simulated enemy base without detection.

sub_workouts.name: Endurance Combat Gauntlet
sub_workouts.description: Spar against multiple opponents for extended durations with minimal rest.

sub_workouts.name: Multi-Weapon Combat Mastery
sub_workouts.description: Train with multiple weapons (knives, sticks, staffs, firearms) in high-pressure scenarios.

sub_workouts.name: Parkour-Based Escape Tactics
sub_workouts.description: Navigate an urban setting while evading pursuers using stealth and parkour.

sub_workouts.name: Close-Quarters Battle (CQB) Drills
sub_workouts.description: Engage multiple threats in confined spaces while maintaining tactical awareness.

sub_workouts.name: Live Fire Stress Training
sub_workouts.description: Engage moving targets while under simulated attack.

sub_workouts.name: Combat Breathing & Situational Awareness
sub_workouts.description: Maintain calm and precision under extreme stress, controlling breath to maintain control.

sub_workouts.name: Impaired Vision Combat Training
sub_workouts.description: Engage in combat training with simulated impaired vision (smoke, blindfolds, strobe lighting).

sub_workouts.name: Explosive Entry & Tactical Movement
sub_workouts.description: Simulate breaching enemy strongholds and clearing rooms with precision.

sub_workouts.name: Underwater Combat & Escape Training
sub_workouts.description: Engage in underwater combat and escape drills to enhance aquatic adaptability.

sub_workouts.name: Advanced Lockpicking & Entry
sub_workouts.description: Quickly bypass locks and secure entry points under pressure.

sub_workouts.name: Advanced Ropework & Climbing
sub_workouts.description: Rope climb, rappel, and navigate vertical environments with tactical efficiency.

sub_workouts.name: Improvised Weapon Combat
sub_workouts.description: Train in combat scenarios using only improvised weapons (pipes, tools, debris).

sub_workouts.name: Silent Takedown Training
sub_workouts.description: Neutralize opponents with minimal noise and maximum efficiency.

sub_workouts.name: Long-Distance Pursuit Evasion
sub_workouts.description: Evade an elite tracking team through varied terrain using camouflage and deception.

sub_workouts.name: Tactical Night Ops Navigation
sub_workouts.description: Navigate unknown territory in complete darkness with minimal equipment.

sub_workouts.name: Explosive Ordnance Disposal (EOD) Simulation
sub_workouts.description: Disarm mock explosive devices while under time pressure.

sub_workouts.name: Battlefield Trauma Care
sub_workouts.description: Perform combat first aid, tourniquet application, and casualty extraction under fire.

sub_workouts.name: Extreme Climate Combat Adaptation
sub_workouts.description: Engage in full combat scenarios in extreme heat, cold, or hazardous weather conditions.

sub_workouts.name: Moving Vehicle Combat Training
sub_workouts.description: Engage and neutralize threats while inside or on top of moving vehicles.

sub_workouts.name: Multi-Opponent Combat Endurance
sub_workouts.description: Survive and outmaneuver multiple simultaneous opponents in full-contact combat.

sub_workouts.name: Urban Warfare & Guerilla Tactics
sub_workouts.description: Master urban combat movement, blending into environments, and quick escape routes.

sub_workouts.name: Live Hostage Extraction Training
sub_workouts.description: Rescue hostages while neutralizing enemies in a high-risk environment.

sub_workouts.name: Stealth Killhouse Course
sub_workouts.description: Clear an entire killhouse using only silent and precise takedowns.

sub_workouts.name: Real-Time Adaptation Combat Simulation
sub_workouts.description: Engage in combat against unpredictable, real-time AI-driven scenarios.
